commit.message:
re PR c++/59816 ([c++11] Incorrect visibility check in template instantiation when the default constructor is a variadic template.)

2015-03-18  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/59816
	* g++.dg/cpp0x/pr59816.C: New.

From-SVN: r221502
